title: These Walking Pads Are on Sale Today at Amazon
text:
Remote Workers Call Amazon’s Best-Selling Walking Pad a ‘Winter Savior’ for Staying Active, and It's $120 Off Plus more on-sale under-desk treadmills that are easy to set up, use, and store
By Toni Sutton Toni Sutton Toni Sutton is a shopping writer for PEOPLE with over a decade of experience in the digital media industry. She covers some of the best deals on robotic vacuums, kitchen gadgets and tools, cookware, furniture, decor, and more from beloved brands like Shark, Dyson, and Lodge. People Editorial Guidelines Published on January 5, 2024 04:13PM EST We independently evaluate all recommended products and services. If you click on links we provide, we may receive compensation. Learn more .
Photo: Amazon
If your job calls for you to remain seated for a long period, you may find it hard to get your daily steps in. Fortunately, there’s a workaround to incorporate more activity into your day — compact under-desk treadmills , or as many call them walking pads.
These space-saving devices allow you to work out and work simultaneously if you have a standing desk or an adjustable laptop stand. Right now, at Amazon, you can find quite a few of these portable machines on sale — up to 57 percent off.
We did the work for you and rounded up eight walking pads that are marked down, so you can increase your productivity in 2024.
Best Walking Pad Deals at Amazon Cozyinn Under Desk Walkpad with Incline , $149.99 with coupon (orig. $349.99) Sperax Walking Pad , $180 with coupon and Prime (orig. $299.99) Jurtis 2-in-1 Walking Pad , $169.99 (orig. $249.99) Redliro Under Desk Walking Pad , $189.99 with coupon (orig. $359.99) Elseluck 2-in-1 Portable Walking Pad , $169.99 (orig. $249.99) Sperax 2-in-1 Walking Pad , $259.99 (orig. $499.99) QYD US Foldable Walking Pad , $156.99 with coupon (orig. $226.99) Urevo Portable Walking Pad , $249.98 (orig. $329.99) Nordstrom Rack's Best Deals on Workout Clothes Right Now from Brooks, The North Face, and More — Up to 82% Off Sperax Walking Pad, $180 with Coupon and Prime Amazon
Buy on Amazon $300 $180 Even if you aren’t walking trails before or after work, you can still get your exercise in with the Sperax Walking pad. It has a durable steel frame to support up to 320 pounds and a quiet motor that runs up to 3.6 miles per hour, which is silent enough to take your Zoom meetings and calls without interruption.
This Amazon best-seller is equipped with an LED display, so you can accurately track stats such as distance, time, and calories burned at a glance. And with the remote control, you can adjust the speed or stop instantly mid-workout.
The walking pad has racked up thousands of five-star ratings from shoppers, with many stating that it's a great solution for staying active during the colder months in their reviews. One reviewer called it a “winter savior” and “a seamless way to incorporate physical activity into my work routine.”
Redliro Under Desk Walking Pad, $190 with Coupon Amazon
Buy on Amazon $360 $190 The Redliro Walking Pad is another sturdy, slim option that boasts 12 preset programs to cycle between to get the most out of your low-impact workout. This under-desk treadmill can reach a max speed of 4 miles per hour and has a five-layer running belt for enhanced performance. It even comes with Bluetooth functionality, so can you to listen to your favorite music or podcasts while you stroll.
The walking pad has a steel frame, which reduces shock with every step, for a safe workout. It also comes with a remote, so it’s easy to start, stop, or adjust the speed without bending down to reach the LED display.
Sperax 2-in-1 Walking Pad, $260 (Save 48%) Amazon
Buy on Amazon $500 $260 The two-in-one machine by Sperax functions both as a walking and running treadmill, reaching speeds of up to 6.2 miles per hour. Thanks to its foldable design and built-in wheels, you can easily move it from room to room. It has a 2.25-horsepower motor that minimizes noise levels, and it’s fitted with a non-slip and shock-absorbent deck to move comfortably and quietly.
Plus, the machine comes with a holder that fits devices like smartphones and tablets, ideal for those who like to watch a TV show or movie while they get their steps in. Users say it's great for speed walking and fast running, and it’s compact enough to slide underneath their couches.
